Name: Identifier
Description: This field is used to record an identifier attributed to the documented image.

Name: Identifier Type
Description: This field is used to record the type of the identifier attributed to the documented image.

Name: Identifier Provider
Description: This field is used to record the institution, group or individual responsible for providing the documented image's identifier.

Name: Identifier Source
Description: This field is used to record the source based on which the identifier was attributed to the documented image.

Name: Name
Description: This field is used to record the main name attributed to the documented image.

Name: Name Language
Description: This field is used to record the language of the main name attributed to the documented image.

Name: Name Part
Description: This field is used to record a specific part of the name attributed to the documented image.

Name: Name Part Type
Description: This field is used to record the type of the specific part of the name attributed to the documented image.

Name: Name Part Language
Description: This field is used to record the language of the part of the name attributed to the documented image.

Name: Alternative Name
Description: This field is used to record an alternative  name under which the documented image is known.

Name: Alternative Name Type
Description: This field is used to record the type of the alternative name that has been attributed to the documented image.

Name: Alternative Name Language
Description: This field is used to record the language of the alternative name attributed to the documented image.

Name: Alternative Name Use Period - Earliest
Description: This field is used to record the earliest known date for use of the alternative name attributed to the documented object.

Name: Alternative Name Use Period - Latest
Description: This field is used to record the latest known date for use of the alternative name attributed to the documented image.

Name: Alternative Name - Attributed by
Description: This field is used to record the organization or individual attributing the alternative name to the documented object.

Name: Alternative Name - Source
Description: This field is used to record the source on the basis of which the organization attributing the alternative name use based their attribution.

Name: Type
Description: This field is used to record the formal type of the documented object.

Name: Type Attributor
Description: This field is used to record the institution, group or individual responsible for attributing the formal type to the documented image.

Name: Type Attributor
Description: This field is used to record the institution, group or individual responsible for attributing the formal type to the documented image.

Name: Type Qualifying Description
Description: This field is used to record a description of the formal type attributed to the documented object using free text.

Name: Style
Description: This field is used to record the style by which the documented object can be classified with or for which it is exemplary.

Name: Style Attributor
Description: This field is used to record the actor who attributed the style to the documented object.
